#Load libraries
```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
library(mapproj)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
sf_trees <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-01-28/sf_trees.csv')
```

```{r}
states <- map_data("state") %>%
  filter(region == "california")


```

```{r}
county <- map_data("county")%>%
  filter(region == "california") %>%
  filter(subregion == "san francisco")
```

Ë†

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data = county, aes(x =long, 
                                  y= lat, 
                                  group= group),
               color = "black",
               fill= "transparent") +
  geom_point(data= Sftree, aes(x= longitude, 
                               y= latitude,
                               color = species)) +
  guides(color=FALSE) +
  labs(x= "Longitude", y= "Latitude", title = "Tree Species Scattered Throughout San Francisco",
       subtitle = "Kwanzan Flowering Cherry") +
    theme_light() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5),
         plot.subtitle=element_text(hjust=0.5))
```
